Title: DllShepherd Samples
Description:
Complete samples for code I use in my blog:
http://DllShepherd.net

Samples available:
1. Silverlight: Adding Google Streets View
HomeWiki:
Dll Shepherd's Sample projects
Please visit my blog DllShepherd.

I am also maintaining a Notes blog where I keep all of the draft posts (some of the code will be used in that blog).

I hope you find the code helpful,
Roy Dallal

Projects currently available:
1. Silverlight: Adding Google Streets View
The code need ESRI Silverlight API 2.1 ESRI.ArcGIS.Client.dll
The aspx for this post is in SilverlightGoogleMaps\DllShepherd.SilverlightGoogleMaps.Web\GoogleMapsApi2TestPage.aspx
Uses ConfigWrapper and Server Resources
2. Silverlight: Adding Google Streets View, Part 2
The code need ESRI Silverlight API 2.1 ESRI.ArcGIS.Client.dll
The aspx for this post is in SilverlightGoogleMaps\DllShepherd.SilverlightGoogleMaps.Web\GoogleMapsApi3TestPage.aspx
Uses ConfigWrapper and Server Resources
3. Silverlight: Game Programming with Kodu
The Kodu file for Tic-Tac-Toe is in Kodu\Tic-Tac-Toe\Tic-Tac-Toe v01, by RoyDallal.Kodu
4. DllShepherd.SystemInternalTools
A tool to monitor the active focused window (command line application).
